snippet: Andrea Elliott began following Dasani and her family in September 2012. The series is based on real-time reporting by Ms. Elliott and Ruth Fremson, a photographer with The Times.
lead_paragraph: Andrea Elliott began following Dasani and her family in September 2012. The series is based on real-time reporting by Ms. Elliott and Ruth Fremson, a photographer with The Times.

headline.main: Summary of Reporting and Source Notes
